settings.label: Header style
settings.info: Header 1 matches the Sacred Rebel homepage design (fixed, transparent-to-solid on scroll).

settings.label: Footer style
settings.info: Footer 1 matches the Sacred Rebel design (dark charcoal, newsletter, brand + link columns).

settings.label: Show color swatches
settings.info: When on, Color option shows as swatches. When off, Color shows as a dropdown.

settings.label: Swatch color map (optional)
settings.info: One line per color: Option value|||Hex (e.g. Vintage Black|||#1A1A1A). Option value must match your product Color option exactly. Leave empty for neutral placeholders.
